channel.title: Gwt Uifactory on Codetab
channel.description: Recent content in Gwt Uifactory on Codetab

item.title: UiFactory - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 6.4. UiFactory UiBinder constructs a widget in multiple ways, and they fall into two categories. UiBinder creates the widget and insert it to UI structure. Application code creates the widget and hand it over to UiBinder to insert it to UI structure. Widget creation delegated to UiBinder This is of two types - without value attributes and with value attributes. Without value attributes - For <f:TitlePanel ui:field=”titlePanel” />, UiBinder uses default constructor of TitlePanel to create the widget.
